text: Nasrudin took a second wife, but the women always asked him to choose a favorite. Tired of his constant rivalry for more attention, he went to the bazaar and bought two identical green tapes. When he got home, he called the two women, separately, and gave each one a tape. Carry this tape under your clothes, but don't show it or talk about it to anyone. The next time the two women asked which one he preferred, he said, "My favorite is the one who wears a green ribbon under her clothes. FIN
title: La preferida
author: nan Anónimo
